homeIntroParagraphs: We are based in Egypt and specialize in private airport shuttles and premium car service for business, families, and travelers.
From Cairo to Alexandria, Sharm El Sheikh, Hurghada, and all major cities, our drivers deliver safe, on-time transfers.
We offer clear pricing, 24/7 support, and a modern fleet tailored to every trip size.

aboutParagraphs: Baraka Limousine delivers premium limousine services in Egypt with modern vehicles, fair pricing, and 24/7 support.
We focus on customer comfort and safety with professional drivers and a fast booking experience.

blogPosts.title: Tips for Booking an Airport Limo with Ease
blogPosts.excerpt: Learn the key steps to book an airport limo quickly and safely.
content: Book your ride early and confirm the exact pickup point inside the terminal.
Share flight details so we can track delays and adjust the pickup time.
Choose the right vehicle class based on passengers, luggage, and arrival time.
Confirm the driver contact number and vehicle details before you fly.
If you are arriving late night, ask about 24/7 availability and support.
For families, SUVs and vans provide extra space for strollers and bags.
For business travel, sedans offer a quiet ride and fast city transfers.
Always confirm the destination address and any required stops.
For international arrivals, allow extra time for immigration and baggage claim.
Keep WhatsApp ready for fast communication in case of terminal changes.
Ask if meet-and-greet inside the hall is available for smoother pickups.
Let us know about extra luggage or oversized items in advance.
Request child seats early to guarantee availability at the airport.
Choose a fixed-price quote to avoid surprises during peak hours.
Save the driver location pin so you can meet quickly at the gate.

blogPosts.title: Business Comfort Starts with Transportation
blogPosts.excerpt: How business-class service helps save time and stay focused.
content: Business travel requires punctuality, privacy, and consistent service.
Professional drivers respect schedules and plan the fastest routes.
Quiet vehicles help you prepare for meetings or take calls on the move.
You can pre-book multi-stop itineraries for a full day of meetings.
Airport pickups are coordinated with flight times to avoid delays.
Dedicated support helps with last-minute changes and route updates.
Choose sedans for executive travel or SUVs for small teams.
Fixed pricing keeps budgeting predictable for corporate trips.
Request invoices with company details for easier expense reporting.
VIP service ensures confidentiality and a professional appearance.
Select vehicles with extra legroom for longer business transfers.
Allow buffer time between meetings to reduce schedule pressure.
Use the same driver for a full day to keep timing consistent.

blogPosts.title: A Guide to Choosing the Right Wedding Limo
blogPosts.excerpt: Plan your wedding day with luxury cars and unique service.
content: Choose a vehicle that matches the style of your wedding day.
Book early to secure the exact model and color you prefer.
Ask about decoration options, ribbons, and floral arrangements.
Plan the pickup time with a buffer to avoid last-minute delays.
Consider the route, parking options, and photo locations.
For larger families, add a second vehicle to keep everyone together.
Confirm the driver dress code for a polished experience.
Make sure the car is spotless and ready for photos.
Share a timeline with the driver for smooth transitions.
Choose a car with a spacious back seat for the dress.
Coordinate with the photographer for arrival moments.
Ask about standby time if the schedule changes.
Confirm the final drop-off location for the end of the night.

blogPosts.title: Private Shuttle in Egypt: What to Expect
blogPosts.excerpt: How private shuttles work in Egypt and how to choose the right vehicle size.
content: Private shuttles give you full control over timing and pickup points.
You avoid shared rides, stops, and delays that reduce comfort.
Choose a vehicle based on group size and luggage for better comfort.
Confirm the route, estimated travel time, and any planned stops.
Airport arrivals should include flight details for tracking.
Ask about child seats if you are traveling with kids.
For long trips, SUVs and vans provide better leg room.
Request a driver who knows your hotel or destination area.
Share hotel entry instructions for faster drop-off.
For tours, plan a flexible schedule with multiple stops.
Ask for bottled water and a clean interior on long rides.
Check if tolls and parking are included in the quote.
Confirm return transfers in advance for a smooth exit.

blogPosts.title: Group Transfers: From Vans to 50-Seat Buses

content: Vans are ideal for 8-14 passengers with standard luggage.
Coasters fit 22-30 passengers with extra space and comfort.
50-seat buses are best for events and large delegations.
Confirm pickup windows to keep group timing organized.
Provide a passenger list if you need multiple stops or hotels.
Ask for luggage capacity details for airport transfers.
For conferences, schedule return trips in advance.
Assign a group leader to coordinate boarding and timing.
Share flight details if guests arrive on different flights.
Plan a meeting point to reduce delays at busy venues.
Ask about onboard storage for equipment or banners.
For weddings, arrange separate cars for VIP guests.

content: Share your flight number to track delays and arrival time.

Choose the vehicle size based on luggage and passengers.

Choose a larger vehicle if you have sports equipment.
Confirm whether tolls and parking are included.
Provide hotel details to avoid gate delays on arrival.
